QuestData.Title: Two If By Boat
QuestData.Description: Are you ready to go, $c? One of the sentinels will take you out to the Mirage Raceway.$B$BIf there's anyone left alive out there, please help them.$B$BGoddess watch over you!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Fizzle Brassbolts at Fizzle & Pozzik's Speedbarge in Thousand Needles.
QuestData.RewardText: YES?! Do you see me interrupting your fascinating argument?$B$BNo... no, please, go ahead. I'm sure that your interruption is about something very important. More important than dealing with the survival of everyone here, in fact.$B$B<Fizzle taps his foot impatiently.>
